review.title: “Not for those who want a good position as per experience”
review.pros: Pros – 1. You will get chance to work some very good project and fresh development if you have good knowledge + experience.2. During your tenure you can get to learn a lot of new things with some highly qualified team mates.
review.cons: Cons – 1. If you are working in old application(JSP-Servlet) then you won't learn anything and also won't get chance to work in other good projects until tell the management.2. You won't get reward even if you deserve. Only a few selected people gets this chance.3. To get a good position in company(TL, Module lead), you need to have a very good relation with existing TL and management and do any work provided to you without questions.4. Increment process is also not transparent.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – 1. Please stand by the employee in their problems. Support them. Reward them if they deserve.2. Don't cheat the employees.
